pitch.cc: Justin Verlander showed faith in Alex Avila by throwing that curveball in the dirt with a runner on 3rd.
That was pitch number 45 for Justin Verlander; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .171 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .241 off him after that.
Justin Verlander is having trouble locating his four-seam fastball, missing the strike zone with his last three.

pitch.cc: That was pitch number 45 for Tommy Hunter; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .283 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .331 off him after that.
Dangerous count for Tommy Hunter; Miguel Cabrera is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a 1.046 OPS against them this season and .971 against everything else.
Tommy Hunter is still attacking Miguel Cabrera with the four-seam fastball even though Cabrera hit one for a home run last time up.
